name: Food Calorie Tracker Backend
description: Django REST API backend for food calorie tracking application with AI-powered food recognition

DEBUG.description: Django debug mode (should be False for production)

FRONTEND_URL.description: Frontend application URL for CORS configuration

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: OpenAI API key for food recognition features

USDA_API_KEY.description: USDA FoodData Central API key (optional but recommended)

scripts.postdeploy: python manage.py migrate --noinput && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput
